name: Caesar II
description: This installer assumes that you own the game CD but do not have a functioning CD drive to access game files. It downloads these files from the internet for you.

write_file.content:
[autoexec]
# Lines in this section will be run at startup.
@echo off
mount C $GAMEDIR/C
mount D $GAMEDIR/D
C:

;
;Miles Design Audio Interface Library V3.02 of 18-Jan-95
;
DEVICE      Creative Labs Sound Blaster(TM) 16
DRIVER      SBPRO2.MDI
IO_ADDR     220h
IRQ         -1
DMA_8_BIT   -1
DMA_16_BIT  -1

;
;Miles Design Audio Interface Library V3.02 of 18-Jan-95
;
DEVICE      Creative Labs Sound Blaster 16 or AWE32
DRIVER      SB16.DIG
IO_ADDR     220h
IRQ         -1
DMA_8_BIT   -1
DMA_16_BIT  -1

resaud=D:\
resmap=D:\
ressfx=D:\
rescdis=D:\
sync=D:\
patchDir=C:\SIERRA\Caesar2;D:\;D:\patches

content:
files:
- c2package:
    filename: c2.zip
    url: http://www.starehry.eu/download/strategy/Caesar.2.CD-www.oldgames.sk-Compilation.exe
- p7package: https://lutris.net/files/tools/p7zip-16.02-i686.tar.gz
game:
  config_file: $GAMEDIR/play.conf
  main_file: $GAMEDIR/C/C2.BAT
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/E
    file: c2package
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/p7z
    file: $p7package
- execute:
    command: mkdir $GAMEDIR/C; cp -r $GAMEDIR/E/C/SIERRA/CAESAR2/* $GAMEDIR/C
    description: Extracting game data...
- execute:
    command: mkdir $GAMEDIR/D; cd $GAMEDIR/D; $CACHE/p7z/7z x $GAMEDIR/E/CD/CAESAR2.ISO
    description: Extracting more game data...
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/play.conf
    key: aspect
    section: render
    value: true
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/play.conf
    key: fullscreen
    section: sdl
    value: true
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/play.conf
    key: sbtype
    section: sblaster
    value: sb16
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/play.conf
    key: cycles
    section: cpu
    value: max
- write_file:
    content: '

      [autoexec]

      # Lines in this section will be run at startup.

      @echo off

      mount C $GAMEDIR/C

      mount D $GAMEDIR/D

      C:

      '
    file: $GAMEDIR/play.conf
    mode: a
- write_file:
    content: '

      ;

      ;Miles Design Audio Interface Library V3.02 of 18-Jan-95

      ;

      DEVICE      Creative Labs Sound Blaster(TM) 16

      DRIVER      SBPRO2.MDI

      IO_ADDR     220h

      IRQ         -1

      DMA_8_BIT   -1

      DMA_16_BIT  -1

      '
    file: $GAMEDIR/C/MDI.INI
- write_file:
    content: '

      ;

      ;Miles Design Audio Interface Library V3.02 of 18-Jan-95

      ;

      DEVICE      Creative Labs Sound Blaster 16 or AWE32

      DRIVER      SB16.DIG

      IO_ADDR     220h

      IRQ         -1

      DMA_8_BIT   -1

      DMA_16_BIT  -1

      '
    file: $GAMEDIR/C/DIG.INI
- write_file:
    content: '

      resaud=D:\

      resmap=D:\

      ressfx=D:\

      rescdis=D:\

      sync=D:\

      patchDir=C:\SIERRA\Caesar2;D:\;D:\patches

      '
    file: $GAMEDIR/C/RESOURCE.CFG
